msContents.summary: This manuscript is of the famous literary work called the Mahābhārata. It consist of the Mausalaparva and Svargārohaṇaparva. It reperesents the Southern recension of the Mahābhārata. The beginning of Mausalparva matches with the well known Southern edition Kumbhakonam edition of the Mahābhārata and the Svargārohaṇaparva matches with the other well known southern edition Shastri-Vavilla edition of the Mahābhārata.

TEI.text:
oṁ śrīvaiśaṁpāyanaḥ ṣaṭ traṃśe tv atha saṃprāpte varṣe kauravanandanaḥ dadarśa viparītāni nimi
rūkṣāḥ śarkaravarṣiṇaḥ apasavyāni śakunā maṇḍalāni pracakrire |
sukhamaśnute | vyāsaprasādena punaḥ svargalokaṁ sa gacchhati || etadviditvā sarvaṁ tat sarvavedārthavidbhavet | pūjanīyaśca satataṁ
māninīyo bhaveddvijaḥ || iti śrīmahābhārate śatasahasrikāyāṁ saṁhitāyām svargārohaṇike pañcamodhyāyāḥ
